dcterms:description: The subsets (book domains) of Amazon Product dataset. The item grouping relies on the field 'categories'. Each training sample is truncated at length 20. As a pre-processing step, groups with fewer than 50 items are considered as a single group, named the 'infrequent group'.
dcterms:title: Amazon-Book

dcterms:description: Collected about 1 million user behaviors data based on Taobaoâ€™s recommender systems during November 25 to December 03, 2017. The item grouping relies on the field 'category ID'. Each training sample is truncated at length 50. As a pre-processing step, groups with fewer than 200 items are considered as a single group, named the 'infrequent group'.
dcterms:title: Taobao
